summary: Have your followers ever gotten stuck because they cant pass through certain zoning points? Well mine have so I bring you this nifty little spell that teleports your followers to you!
descriptionHtml:
Have your followers ever gotten stuck because they cant pass through certain zoning points? Well mine have so I bring you this nifty little spell that teleports your followers to you! I even added a custom effect for when you have the spell in your hand. Sorry for the lack of pazaz in this description, This is my first mod I ever uploaded

P.S you can find the spell in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun
author: UnOriginalGam3r

files.name: Spell to Summon Followers NMM Compatible
files.fileName: Spell to Summon Followers NMM Compatible-38769-1.zip
